meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being everyday.
meanings.sent1: The everydayness of his routine brought comfort and familiarity.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the everydayness of our morning coffee together.
meanings.sent3: The everydayness of wearing mismatched socks made him smile.
meanings.sent4: She found beauty in the everydayness of a simple sunset.
meanings.sent5: The everydayness of her laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: The state of being ordinary or commonplace.
meanings.sent1: The everydayness of the task made it easy to overlook.
meanings.sent2: I find comfort in the everydayness of our conversations.
meanings.sent3: The everydayness of his jokes always made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: She longed for something beyond the everydayness of her life.
meanings.sent5: The everydayness of the cityscape was both calming and familiar.
